GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

APP_DATE.title: Date of Application
APP_DATE.instruction:
Enter the date of application in DD-MM-YYYY format.
Example: '25-12-2023'

STAFF_STATUS.title: IDFC FIRST Bank Staff?
STAFF_STATUS.instruction: Tick 'Yes' if you are an employee of IDFC FIRST Bank. Otherwise, tick 'No'.

LOAN_PURPOSE.title: Purpose of Personal Loan
LOAN_PURPOSE.instruction:
Tick the reason for the loan (e.g., 'Travel', 'Medical', 'Wedding'). If 'Others', specify the reason.
Example: 'Renovation'

LOAN_AMOUNT.title: Loan Amount
LOAN_AMOUNT.instruction:
Enter the exact loan amount you are requesting in Rupees.
Example: '5,00,000'

LOAN_TENURE.title: Desired Tenure (Months)
LOAN_TENURE.instruction:
Tick the number of months you want to repay the loan over.
Options: 12, 24, 36, 48, 60.

APPLICANT_TYPE.title: Applicant Type
APPLICANT_TYPE.instruction: Tick 'Applicant' if you are the primary borrower. Tick 'Co-applicant' if you are joining an existing application.

EXISTING_FINANCE.title: Existing Finance with IDFC?
EXISTING_FINANCE.instruction: Tick 'Yes' if you already have a loan with IDFC. If Yes, provide the 'Application Reference No'.
rejections: Yes selected but Ref No. missing

C_KYC_NO.title: C-KYC Number
C_KYC_NO.instruction:
Enter your Central KYC Registry number if available.
Example: '10002000300040'

APPLICANT_NAME.title: Applicant Name
APPLICANT_NAME.instruction:
Enter your First, Middle, and Last Name exactly as per your ID proof.
Example: 'RAHUL KUMAR SHARMA'

FATHER_SPOUSE_NAME.title: Father's / Spouse's Name
FATHER_SPOUSE_NAME.instruction:
Enter the First, Middle, and Last Name of your Father or Spouse.
Example: 'MOHAN LAL SHARMA'

MOTHER_NAME.title: Mother's Name
MOTHER_NAME.instruction:
Enter your Mother's First, Middle, and Last Name.
Example: 'SUNITA DEVI'

PHOTO_SIGN.title: Photograph & Signature
PHOTO_SIGN.instruction: Paste a recent colour photograph in the box and sign ACROSS it.

PAN_NO.title: PAN Number
PAN_NO.instruction:
Enter your 10-character Permanent Account Number.
Example: 'ABCDE1234F'

AADHAAR_NO.title: Aadhaar Number
AADHAAR_NO.instruction: Enter your 12-digit Aadhaar Card Number (Optional but recommended).

DOB.title: Date of Birth
DOB.instruction:
Enter your Date of Birth in DD-MM-YYYY format.
Example: '15-08-1985'

EMAIL_ID.title: E-mail ID
EMAIL_ID.instruction:
Enter your personal email address for correspondence.
Example: 'rahul.sharma@email.com'

QUALIFICATION.title: Qualification
QUALIFICATION.instruction: Tick your highest educational qualification (e.g., 'Graduate', 'Post Graduate').

CURRENT_ADDRESS_DETAILS.title: Current Residential Address
CURRENT_ADDRESS_DETAILS.instruction:
Enter your full current address including Flat/House No, Building, Street, Landmark, City, State, and Pin Code.
Example: 'Flat 101, Galaxy Apts, MG Road, Mumbai, 400001'

RESIDENCE_TYPE.title: Residence Type
RESIDENCE_TYPE.instruction: Tick the ownership status of your current home: 'Rented', 'Self-owned', 'Parental', or 'Company Provided'.

PERM_ADDRESS_DETAILS.title: Permanent Address
PERM_ADDRESS_DETAILS.instruction: If different from current address, fill this section. If same, tick 'Same as Current Residence Address'.
rejections: Address missing when 'Same as...' is unchecked

RELATED_TO_DIRECTOR.title: Relation to Director/Senior Officer
RELATED_TO_DIRECTOR.instruction: Tick 'Yes' if you are a relative of any IDFC Bank Director or Senior Officer. Otherwise, tick 'No'.

OCCUPATION_TYPE.title: Occupation
OCCUPATION_TYPE.instruction: Tick your employment type: 'Salaried' (if you have a job) or 'Self Employed' (if you run a business).

COMPANY_DETAILS.title: Company Name & Type
COMPANY_DETAILS.instruction:
Enter the name of your employer or business. Tick the entity type (e.g., 'Pvt Ltd', 'Proprietorship').
Example: 'INFOSYS LTD'

OFFICE_ADDRESS.title: Office Address
OFFICE_ADDRESS.instruction: Enter your full work address including Pin Code and Office Phone Number.

INCOME_DETAILS_SALARIED.title: Income (For Salaried)
INCOME_DETAILS_SALARIED.instruction:
Fill ONLY if Salaried. Enter Designation, Department, and Net Monthly Take Home Salary.
Example: 'Manager', 'IT', '75000'
rejections: Salaried selected but income details missing

INCOME_DETAILS_SELF_EMP.title: Income (For Self-Employed)
INCOME_DETAILS_SELF_EMP.instruction:
Fill ONLY if Self-Employed. Enter Date of Incorporation and Annual Income.
Example: '10-04-2015', '12,00,000'
rejections: Self-Employed selected but income details missing

GST_DETAILS.title: GST Declaration
GST_DETAILS.instruction:
Tick if you are GST registered. If Yes, enter your GSTIN Number.
Example: '27ABCDE1234F1Z5'

REPAYMENT_MODE.title: Preferred Repayment Mode
REPAYMENT_MODE.instruction: Tick how you will pay monthly EMIs: 'NACH' (Auto-debit), 'PDC' (Cheques), or 'SI' (Standing Instruction).

BANK_ACC_DETAILS.title: Repayment Bank Account
BANK_ACC_DETAILS.instruction: Enter the details of the bank account from which EMIs will be paid: Bank Name, Account Number, and Type (Savings/Current).

REFERENCE_1.title: Reference 1
REFERENCE_1.instruction:
Provide Name, Relationship, and Mobile Number of a person not living with you.
Example: 'AMIT SINGH, COLLEAGUE, 9876543210'

REFERENCE_2.title: Reference 2
REFERENCE_2.instruction: Provide details for a second reference person.

DECLARATION_SIGNATURE.title: Applicant Signature
DECLARATION_SIGNATURE.instruction: Sign here to confirm all details are true and authorize the bank to check your credit history.

DOCUMENTS_REQUIRED.title: Supporting Documents
DOCUMENTS_REQUIRED.instruction: PAN/Form 60, photo identity proof, address proof, income proof, and business proof (where applicable) must be submitted. Requirements may vary by scheme.

OFFICE_USE.title: Office Use Section
OFFICE_USE.instruction: DSA codes, verification details, and internal certifications are to be completed by bank officials only.
